channel.title: Dark bow spec
channel.description:
Hi guys. I have a big problem...I have a source with new items...There is d bow too.D bow haves a special animation, but when I useing spec att on d bow it hits low like with out spec....PLease help me, how to fix it!!! How to do better spec hits?
Sorry for my bad english!
